country.title: Flights to {{country}}, {{continent}} ✈️ {{domain}}

about.title: About {{domain}}: Your Gateway to Seamless Travel
about.description: Whether you're searching for the cheapest flights or the most convenient schedules, {{domain}} ensures you find the perfect option to suit your needs. Start your travel journey with us today and experience the difference.
